ActJudges Act
SubjectHon. Marc Beauregard ** RETIREMENT AND ANNUITY **
PrecisRetirement and granting of an ANNUITY to the Hon. MARC BEAUREGARD, a Judge of the Court of Appeal of Quebec, effective July 14, 2012.
